DOC.brief_summary: Use of excess materials generally discarded in the process of undergoing IVF treatment to further develop and validate laboratory techniques.
DOC.detailed_description: 1- Testing methods or freezing eggs and/or sperm before implementing techniques. 2- Develop cell surgery and micromanipulation techniques. 3- Develop methods to optimize the determinations of genes and chromosomes in embryos. 4- Quality-assess laboratory equipment. 5- Test proficiency of laboratory staff. 6- Analyze what effects the early development of gametes and embryos. 7- Develop new methods and media to allow for higher survival rates of gametes and embryos. 8- Develop non-invasive tests for predicting oocyte and embryo quality to predict IVF success.
